title: eRacks- best service provider for dedicated hosting services at the better prices
text: eRacks- best service provider for dedicated hosting services at the better prices Press release briefs about the company, specializes in building quiet rack mount, desktop computer, customized Linux and open source OSes. USA, 22 September 2015 -- eRacks has great experience building quiet rack mount and desktop computers, as well as customizing Linux and other Open Source OSes. We offer more flexibility in Rack Mount server configuration. We offer preconfigured custom Linux rackmount servers, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, and NetBSD rackmount servers. At, eRacks we offer wide choices for operation systems including Ubuntu, Debian, openSUSE, Fedora Linux and other rackmount server configurations. We’ve a good team of professionals offer onsite installation, open source migration services, including network consulting and software development services.The businesses and individuals who’re getting started with the development of website, can setup an open source content management system with nearly any Linux Openstack hosting package. Using the MySQL database, user can easily integrate the membership and content management feature into the website without the need of custom development. Working with CMS improves the development time. Using Linux based hosting platform with open PHP and MySQL based software package, you will get the flexibility to create the website as you need. We help you to your both time and money mixing up the quality open source enterprise-level software and easily-upgradeable industry-standard components in its rack mount servers. As a user you may begin with simple site. Moreover, using open source ensures that you can scale up your hosting installation to handle the web traffic as your site grows. We offer dedicated hosting services that can be easily setup and expand the ability of your website. If you have a small business and you’re looking to expand your marketing service, selection open hosting that allows you to easily develop varieties of feature rich websites. eRacks Open Source Systems offer cost effective open source Rack mount server, Desktop Computers, Open Source enterprise migration, security, and network architecture design. Our technicians offer best in class server hosting to customers to receive a full root access on a leased custom built dedicated physical server. We offer good team of technicians having in-depth technical knowledge and relevant experience to offer and recommend the effective enterprise level solution. Feel free to visit our website http://www.eracks.com and contact us. eRacks Open Source Systems
